name: dataflow_projects_locations_jobs_workItems_lease
description: Leases a dataflow WorkItem to run.

projectId.description: Identifies the project this worker belongs to.

location.description: The [regional endpoint] (https://cloud.google.com/dataflow/docs/concepts/regional-endpoints) that contains the WorkItem's job.

jobId.description: Identifies the workflow job this worker belongs to.

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters.

currentWorkerTime.description: The current timestamp at the worker.

location.description: The [regional endpoint] (https://cloud.google.com/dataflow/docs/concepts/regional-endpoints) that contains the WorkItem's job.

additionalProperties.description: Properties of the object. Contains field @type with type URL.

workerCapabilities.description: Worker capabilities. WorkItems might be limited to workers with specific capabilities.

workerId.description: Identifies the worker leasing work -- typically the ID of the virtual machine running the worker.

$block: Response to a request to lease WorkItems.

$ul: **workItems**: A list of the leased WorkItems.
